conversations.english: What's up? You look low.怎么了，看起来不大高兴。
conversations.chinese: 怎么了，看起来不大高兴。
conversations.reply_english: It's my girlfriend. I guess she's playing the army game with me.是为了我的女朋友，我觉得她一直在欺骗我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是为了我的女朋友，我觉得她一直在欺骗我。

conversations.english: Can I help you, sir?先生，需要服务吗？
conversations.chinese: 先生，需要服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I've been sitting here for a few minutes.I'm waiting for someone to put gas in my car.我在这里等一阵子了。我在这里等人帮我加油。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在这里等一阵子了。我在这里等人帮我加油。

conversations.english: My goodness!What happened?You have blood on your face.我的天！怎么了？你的脸上有血。
conversations.chinese: 我的天！怎么了？你的脸上有血。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,don't worry.I just killed a pigeon.噢，别担心。我刚刚宰了一只鸽子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，别担心。我刚刚宰了一只鸽子。

conversations.english: oh,no, it seems that I’ve lost my train ticket.糟了，我的车票好像丢了。
conversations.chinese: 糟了，我的车票好像丢了。
conversations.reply_english: are you kidding? The train leaves in an hour. Where did you put it?开玩笑吧？火车还有一个小时就开了，你放哪儿了？
conversations.reply_chinese: 开玩笑吧？火车还有一个小时就开了，你放哪儿了？

conversations.english: Oh, my God! I've been cheated!天啊！我被骗了。
conversations.chinese: 天啊！我被骗了。
conversations.reply_english: What? What did you buy?什么？你买了什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么？你买了什么？

title: 被误解的时候都会难受的

conversations.english: Hi, why do you look so depressed today, Mike?嗨，麦克，你怎么今天看起来不高兴呀？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，麦克，你怎么今天看起来不高兴呀？
conversations.reply_english: I had a terrible quarrel with my neighbor yesterday.我昨天和我的邻居大吵了一顿。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我昨天和我的邻居大吵了一顿。

title: 你有时候真的很没礼貌

conversations.english: Are you there, Mary?玛丽，你在吗？
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，你在吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm back. My bid on the Buddha is still the highest!我回来了。我出的佛像标价还是最高的
conversations.reply_chinese: 我回来了。我出的佛像标价还是最高的

conversations.english: What do you think of this one?你认为这个怎么样?
conversations.chinese: 你认为这个怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Eh, so so.还行吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 还行吧。

title: 无法相信我居然赌球输了

conversations.english: I can’t believe it!我简直无法相信！
conversations.chinese: 我简直无法相信！
conversations.reply_english: What’s wrong? That was a great goal.怎么了？这可是个好球。
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么了？这可是个好球。

conversations.english: I've been standing here since half past seven. Where on earth have you been?我从七点半就一直站在这儿等你。你到底上哪儿去了？
conversations.chinese: 我从七点半就一直站在这儿等你。你到底上哪儿去了？
conversations.reply_english: I'm terribly sorry I'm late. I just couldn't help it.真太对不起，我迟到了。不过我实在没办法。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真太对不起，我迟到了。不过我实在没办法。

conversations.english: Here you are at last! You're half an hour late, you know.你终于来了！知道吗，你晚了半小时。
conversations.chinese: 你终于来了！知道吗，你晚了半小时。
conversations.reply_english: I'm awfully sorry to have kept you waiting for so long.非常抱歉让你等这么久。
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常抱歉让你等这么久。

conversations.english: How did Jim get the money?吉姆是怎么弄到钱的？
conversations.chinese: 吉姆是怎么弄到钱的？
conversations.reply_english: He borrowed it from Nick.他从尼克哪借来的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他从尼克哪借来的。

conversations.english: Where are we heading, Shirley?我们应该走哪边呢？雪莉。
conversations.chinese: 我们应该走哪边呢？雪莉。
conversations.reply_english: It's up to you.你决定吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你决定吧。

conversations.english: Don’t be worried. Please sit down and take it easy.不用担心，先请坐下来消消气。
conversations.chinese: 不用担心，先请坐下来消消气。
conversations.reply_english: How could I feel easy? I’m really pissed.我怎么能轻松得了？我真是气死了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我怎么能轻松得了？我真是气死了。

conversations.english: When he told me I had to work overtime, that was it.当他告诉我我必须加班的时候，我受够了。
conversations.chinese: 当他告诉我我必须加班的时候，我受够了。
conversations.reply_english: The last straw, huh?你是忍无可忍了，是吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是忍无可忍了，是吗？

title: 你在这件事上很没有风度

conversations.english: You are not being a good sport about this.你在这件事上没有风度。
conversations.chinese: 你在这件事上没有风度。
conversations.reply_english: That's because you cheated.那是因为你作弊。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是因为你作弊。

conversations.english: Hi Joe. You met my new assistant, right?嗨，Joe.你见过我的新助理了吧？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，Joe.你见过我的新助理了吧？
conversations.reply_english: Emm...yes. But I wasn't too impressed. I found her a little stuck up.嗯……没错。但是我觉得她不怎么样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯……没错。但是我觉得她不怎么样。

title: 你不是承诺了要戒烟吗 Give up smoking

conversations.english: It smells like an ashtray in here!这儿闻起来有股烟灰缸的味道。
conversations.chinese: 这儿闻起来有股烟灰缸的味道。
conversations.reply_english: Hi honey! What’s wrong? Why do you have that look on your face?亲爱的，怎么了？你脸上的表情怎么那么难看？
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，怎么了？你脸上的表情怎么那么难看？

title: 他是太过紧张处女秀才发火的

conversations.english: Harry was angry last night.哈利昨天晚上发火了。
conversations.chinese: 哈利昨天晚上发火了。
conversations.reply_english: That's because he's getting nervous. Anyway, this is the first time he's directed a play.那是因为他太紧张了。不管怎么说，这是他第一次导演一出戏。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是因为他太紧张了。不管怎么说，这是他第一次导演一出戏。

title: 你气得面红耳赤的 Blue in the face

conversations.english: You are blue in the face, arn't you?你面红耳赤的，生气啦？
conversations.chinese: 你面红耳赤的，生气啦？
conversations.reply_english: The cat has eaten my fish, I'll kill it.猫吃了我的鱼，我要杀了它。
conversations.reply_chinese: 猫吃了我的鱼，我要杀了它。

title: 吵架和和好都是两个人双方面的事情

conversations.english: When I quarrel with my husband. He didn't evern try to cool me out.我和丈夫吵架的时候，他连理都不理我。
conversations.chinese: 我和丈夫吵架的时候，他连理都不理我。
conversations.reply_english: It takes two to make a quarrel and it takes two to mend fences.吵架和和好是双方面的事情。
conversations.reply_chinese: 吵架和和好是双方面的事情。

title: 玛丽干了一天的活儿却受到责备

conversations.english: Mary seems depressed. What’s the matter?Mary看起来很不开心，她怎么啦？
conversations.chinese: Mary看起来很不开心，她怎么啦？
conversations.reply_english: She didn’t expect to get a kick in the teeth after a day’s hard work.她没有想到自己辛辛苦苦干了一天的活儿却受到责备。
conversations.reply_chinese: 她没有想到自己辛辛苦苦干了一天的活儿却受到责备。

title: 你为什么不去影院和我碰面呢 Misunderstanding

conversations.english: Come in, come in！进来，进来!
conversations.chinese: 进来，进来!
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Gary, what happened? I was waiting for you at the theater. Why didn’t you meet me there?嗨，加里，发生了什么事？我在电影院等你。你为什么没去那里和我碰面呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，加里，发生了什么事？我在电影院等你。你为什么没去那里和我碰面呢？

title: 他生我的气了 He's mad at me

conversations.english: He's not mad at me?他不生我的气？
conversations.chinese: 他不生我的气？
conversations.reply_english: Not at all. He says your being a lying, cheating, backstabbing spy really helped to motivate him.完全没有。他说你这个说谎、背叛、玩阴的间谍，大大地激励了他。
conversations.reply_chinese: 完全没有。他说你这个说谎、背叛、玩阴的间谍，大大地激励了他。

title: 你别以为我会就这样相信你 Stay away

conversations.english: Hi, Elvin. How are the new programmers I got for you?嗨，艾文。我帮你找来的新程序设计师如何？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，艾文。我帮你找来的新程序设计师如何？
conversations.reply_english: Stay away from me.离我远一点。
conversations.reply_chinese: 离我远一点。
